name: Snoody: One of the Ayrie
description:
This game is created as part of the GameDev Experience Stables project, which aims to develop a complete gaming product and help all participants find jobs in the GameDev industry.

Over 120 people wanted to take part in the project, and after numerous interviews, a team of 27 specialists of different levels was formed. Although the recruitment process took only two weeks, we were forming as a team throughout the whole project.

We managed to achieve incredible results, which you can appreciate:
- Assembled a strong and talented team.
- Created a Game Design Document (GDD) that describes all aspects of the full game.
- Developed a flexible modular architecture for the game that makes it easy to scale the project.
- Produced numerous beautiful artistic concepts.
- Modeled and animated excellent 3D models.
- Composed a musical soundtrack.
And the best part is, there's a game you can play!

The project started on December 15, 2022, and within 4 months, our creation came to life.

Unfortunately, due to the short timeframe, we were unable to implement many of our ideas:
- We intended to create four distinct planets, each with its own unique inhabitants.
- In the Magic Book, we wanted to implement the ability to mix different elements to discover deadly synergies.
- We planned to add quest chains, mini-games, and spaceship defense mechanics to the game.
Numerous ideas were suggested and documented, but their implementation came down to time and financial costs. I would like to remind you that our project is non-commercial, and everything you see has been done voluntarily by wonderful people!


OUR AMAZING TEAM


Thank you for your interest in the project! Please help Snoody save the planet and don't forget to leave any feedback about our game!
